M10Robot:AttackTextContainer.NAME: Generic Attack Text
M10Robot:AttackTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing an attack.

M10Robot:SkillTextContainer.NAME: Generic Skill Text
M10Robot:SkillTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing a skill.

M10Robot:PowerTextContainer.NAME: Generic Power Text
M10Robot:PowerTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when playing a power.

M10Robot:BattleStartTextContainer.NAME: Battle Start Text
M10Robot:BattleStartTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of combat.

M10Robot:LowHPBattleStartTextContainer.NAME: Low HP Battle Start Text
M10Robot:LowHPBattleStartTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of combat if you are badly injured.

M10Robot:BattleEndTextContainer.NAME: Battle End Text
M10Robot:BattleEndTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the end of combat.

M10Robot:BossFightTextContainer.NAME: Boss Fight Text
M10Robot:BossFightTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear at the beginning of a boss fight.

M10Robot:HealingTextContainer.NAME: Healing Text
M10Robot:HealingTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when healing.

M10Robot:FieldDamageTextContainer.NAME: Field Damage Text
M10Robot:FieldDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking thorns damage.

M10Robot:LightDamageTextContainer.NAME: Light Damage Text
M10Robot:LightDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking light damage.

M10Robot:HeavyDamageTextContainer.NAME: Heavy Damage Text
M10Robot:HeavyDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when taking heavy damage.

M10Robot:BlockedDamageTextContainer.NAME: Blocked Damage Text
M10Robot:BlockedDamageTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when blocking damage.

M10Robot:KOTextContainer.NAME: KO Text
M10Robot:KOTextContainer.DESCRIPTION: Extended Description used to hold text that will occasionally appear when defeated in battle.
